Reviews.Title: fantastic phone.
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my brother and he absolutely love this phone its just what he wanted great features  good size and the weight is great.

Reviews.Title: Loved it AFTER I learned how to operate it.
Reviews.Author: Godzgirl42
Reviews.Content: It's of great usage in Cameroon where I am. My only problem is that I don't know how to regulate the internet usage through the service provider. I'll have to learn. Otherwise, all of the problems people said they had with it, I haven't had. Although sometimes the touch pad is slow to respond but it's good.

Reviews.Title: Overall good phone
Reviews.Author: Travelpro
Reviews.Content: Good phone for heavy travelers. Feels a bit (too) large at times, especially when you're used to iPhones. Although I found the dual SIM very useful, it is a nightmare to put or remove the bottom one, especially when the SIM has been cut to fit iPhones. Finally, I can't find a case to fit this phone! But again, overall decent phone for the price.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: RMD "RMD"
Reviews.Content: Only had this phone a short while, but so far so good.  Wi Fi works fine, as does domestic US phone service.  Have used an Asian Sim card (Thailand) and that has worked as well.  Can't speak for battery life yet, but so far it's as advertised.

Reviews.Title: IT IS NOT A LG E615F - Is the normal one
Reviews.Author: Santiago Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Please,Be aware that what they send is not the E615F, is the E615. So if you purchase this cellphone be aware of the bands that supports.I purchased this one because it worked with other bands, and I sticked in my a##.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: PSsnk
Reviews.Content: not much space on it. but works great....good price, that is. not that fancy or anything like my Z10 Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Battery Life
Reviews.Author: Victoria Milne
Reviews.Content: The phone works quite well except for the fact that the battery life is really brief.. especially if you're using wifi.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Angel Aranguren "AUTOLOOK"
Reviews.Content: Everything ok. Kids loved it. on time. Fit ok. Better than described. As fun as expected. Only need to buy case

Reviews.Title: Great Phone.
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Bora
Reviews.Content: Great Phone for the price.Works with all carriers in various countries that I have tried.Good battery life.Will highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Wladlen Correa
Reviews.Content: RAM memory is a bit slow but the phone is pretty friendly and applications run very well, and the battery lasts

Reviews.Title: Everything excellent
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: Item arrived on time in the original box. Cell phone works perfect, no problem with the sim card. It's all I was expected.

Reviews.Title: This Phone's from India
Reviews.Author: John Bozeman
Reviews.Content: I took the phone out of the box and could not get the battery to charge.  LG USA could not help me.  It does not recognize or support this model, because it says it's for the international market.  It thought the charger might be bad and suggested going to Best Buy to buy a new one.  First, however, it suggested searching on Google.  There I found LG India supports this phone.  The manual and downloads are there.  And from the manual I got a suggestion to plug the phone in to a computer through the USB cable (provided).  It's charging!  The charger/adapter was indeed bad.I'm giving this phone four stars because of the hassle it's been so far, but it still has potential.

Reviews.Title: YES I LIKE THIS PRODUCT VERY MUCH SO I AM SATISFICED
Reviews.Author: ABEL NIETO
Reviews.Content: I SHOOSED THIS ITEM BECAUSE OF ITS PRICE AND PERFORMANCEI LIKE IT BECAUSE IT WORKS VERY WELLI RECOMEND IT TO EVERY BODY WHO WANTS QUALITY PRODUCTS

Reviews.Title: Thanks item received
Reviews.Author: Jose Velasquez
Reviews.Content: Item arrived in optimal conditions and the expected timepicked this item for the brand and priceI liked the model and color
